1.Removed 'steadily' as OR (steadily is straight-line graph) data provided (ref64?) is non steady. 2. Population counts residents, not citizens, or is it "nationals"? This situation is unique.
Oops, best to do it right
Tried 'politically fragmented' from RS'd quote "political spectrum is highly fragmented", how about "politically diverse", with the same ref. Pls read ref before deletion, or find your own RS

"politically fragmented" is misleading and highly debatable (ie POV). it belongs in a different place if at all

1. important link. 2. UNDUE, if reason is not given in the same context used. Is Bibi going to get one too?
